features: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Body Gel Cream with Hyaluronic Acid instantly quenches thirsty skin
Refreshing and ultra-light body gel formula is powered by Hyaluronic Acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin
Moisturizing body cream is clinically proven to keep your skin feeling smooth and more hydrated for healthy looking skin. It replenishes skin to improve hydration and smoothness

Paraben-free, dye-free, and no drying alcohols, gel cream formula is non-greasy and absorbs instantly so you can get dressed immediately. Developed with dermatologists. For normal to dry skin and is suitable for sensitive skin
Continued use of gel cream with hyaluronic acid provides lasting hydration and improves dry skin over time. Check out full Neutrogena Hydro Boost skin care line
body.description: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream with Hyaluronic Acid instantly quenches thirsty skin. Designed for daily use on dry and sensitive skin, this hydrating body cream replenishes skin to improve hydration and smoothness. This body moisturizer developed with dermatologists is clinically proven to make skin feel smooth and quenched, leaving it beautifully supple. The refreshing, ultra-light gel-cream formula contains hydrating hyaluronic acid, found naturally in skin, boosts hydration and then locks it in. The non-greasy full body cream absorbs instantly and is oil-, dye-, alcohol-, paraben-free. Use body gel daily to retain hydration and help improve the look and feel of dry skin over time. Discover the full Neutrogena Hydro Boost skin care line for daily hydration.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream instantly quenches thirsty skin. Designed for daily use on dry and sensitive skin, this hydrating body cream replenishes skin to improve hydration and smoothness. From the number-one Hyaluronic Acid platform, this body gel cream developed with dermatologists is clinically proven to make skin feel smooth and quenched, leaving it beautifully supple. The refreshing, lightweight formula boosts skin hydrating and then locks it in. The non-greasy body cream absorbs instantly and is oil-, dye-, alcohol-,and paraben-free. Use daily to retain hydration and help improve the look and feel of dry skin over time.

INSTANTLY QUENCHES Instantly quenches for clinically proven supple, hydrated skin. ULTRALIGHT FORMULA Fast-absorbing, ultralight, non-greasy, paraben-free formula from a dermatologist-recommended brand. FORMULATED WITH HYALURONIC ACID Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to help keep skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lotion is very moisturizing and feels and smells great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was curious and skeptical and voila!
reviews.reviewText: Ah, hyaluronic acid, ye mystical humectant. You can cost $9 for a big ole bottle, as with this Neutrogena Hydro boost or, next over on the list, product X is ching-chinging in at $35. I have long thought, What gives? The other selling point for me was that it's either oil free or nearly so, so it might be a winner in summer months in the perspiration-avoidance department. I'm normally a scent-free shopper but a number of reviews, including a dermatologist on YouTube, claimed the texture of the scented was nicer. The scent is in the citrusy department rather than the vanilla or overripe apple department--which would have compelled me to re-gift it. Plus the scent dissipates fairly quickly.The ingredient list requires a chemistry background but that was expected with a big box store type of brand. And I should note that the famed hyaluronic acid is the last ingredient listed, whereas the world's most beloved and used humectant (water-attractor), glycerin, is the second listed ingredient after, uh, water. I buy glycerin by the gallon and use it as a lotion daily. People in olden times always used plain glycerin. I don't know why folks have seemingly forgotten about it. It's in 98% of cosmetics.So, this stuff goes on really smooth, it soaks in instantaneously, whereas plain glycerin will sit around a bit until you rub it in.There is definitely something to all the cheering about the disappearance of crepey skin. I'm not a youngster. My skin is in great condition for my age (thanks, glycerin!) but I'm starting to crepe in a few spots, or something new and weird is going on. This lotion does have a positive effect. It also makes your skin feel cooler than normal to the touch and somehow plump--in a good way. And after the summer of '23, it's a go-to in steamy weather.As for sensitive skin, I do have something like eczema on my elbows and this lotion doesn't irritate but most lotions don't. I don't think I'm a good judge for the sensitive skin factor.So, no idea what ingredient is doing what, if the hyaluronic acid is the hero, or if it all boils down the the glycerin, but I've been impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the best lotion I have used in years. Truly moisturizes & hydrates skin. It’s not greasy either. I will continue to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I loooove this moisturizer!!It's lightweight going on the skin, but does such an amazing job at hydrating and keeping your skin soft!It smells amazing and it does not leave you feeling greasy/sticky

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Provides lasting moisture .
reviews.reviewText: Good value for money. Absorbs very well. Neutral smell, not overwhelming . Very light & smoothing on skin. And you can slip your jeans on without that sticky feeling you get with other moisturizers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Only Lotion I'll Use
reviews.reviewText: Before finding this lotion, I always struggled with very dry skin. I have tried SO many different brands. Anything that seemed to help, left me feeling greasy and gross. Anything that didn't, also didn't last very long. This lotion feels like a miracle! My skin is in a far better state. I never have that slimy lotion feel. I have recommended or bought this for several family members, now they are all hooked. It really works very well!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One thing I hate is moisturizers that leave your skin feeling greasy. This one is totally moisturizing, non greasy and doesn't have a strong odor! This is now my go to moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like the product, the smell and texture. Value for the money. Delivered on time.
Muy buena no queda grasa la piel y muy buen aroma.
It may be expensive but it's worth it

Had the wrong idea that a gel based lotion would be lightweight . In a humid country I find it extremely sticky and hot to have this on your skin. Not what i expected compared to something like avveno ultra sheer lotion
The smell is way too strong and heavy. I will stay without fragrance next time.

Deja la piel sube y la absorbe pronto... aunque ya de rato enfada la aroma, he estado acostumbrada a usar la de Cetaphil que no tiene aroma y esta me hostiga, de ahí en más no le encuentro ningún desperfecto
